member.name: T:Retlang.ITransferEnvelope
member.summary: Packages a message for transfer between contexts.

member.name: M:Retlang.ITransferEnvelope.ResolveMessage
member.summary: Called when the message is delivered to an individual subscriber.

member.name: P:Retlang.ITransferEnvelope.MessageType
member.summary: The type of the message contained in the envelope.

member.name: P:Retlang.ITransferEnvelope.Header
member.summary: The topic and reply topic of the message.

member.name: M:Retlang.IProcessBus.Post(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Posts a message to this context only. The message is not broadcast. Returns true if a subscriber is found.

member.name: M:Retlang.IProcessBus.SubscribeToKeyedBatch``2(Retlang.ITopicMatcher,Retlang.ResolveKey{``0,``1},Retlang.On{System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{``0,Retlang.IMessageEnvelope{``1}}},System.Int32)
member.summary: A batch subscription that drops duplicates based upon the ResolveKey delegate provided.

member.name: M:Retlang.IProcessBus.SubscribeToBatch``1(Retlang.ITopicMatcher,Retlang.On{System.Collections.Generic.IList{Retlang.IMessageEnvelope{``0}}},System.Int32)
member.summary: A batch subscription that delivers a list of events to the subscriber.

member.name: M:Retlang.IProcessBus.SubscribeToLast``1(Retlang.ITopicMatcher,Retlang.OnMessage{``0},System.Int32)
member.summary: Batch subscription that only delivers the last event to the target delegate.

member.name: E:Retlang.IProcessBus.QueueFullEvent
member.summary: Callback from any and all publishing threads. Not Thread Safe. Will only happen if the max size of the queue and the max wait times are set.

member.name: M:Retlang.ISubscriber.Receive(Retlang.ITransferEnvelope,System.Boolean@)
member.param: set to true ONLY if the subscriber consumes the event. Do NOT set to false since events are invoked using a multicast event

member.name: T:Retlang.ObjectTransferEnvelope
member.summary: Transfer objects between contexts without serialization.

member.name: P:Retlang.CommandExecutor.IsEnabled
member.summary: When disabled, commands will be ignored by executor. The executor is typically disabled at shutdown to prevent any pending commands from being executed.
